p.strong: School Nurses on Call During School Closure

div.p:
Lebanon School District nurses are dedicated to continuing to serve students and staff.
During the COVID-19 school closure, if students or staff have a health concern or any question, please feel free to call your building’s school nurse.

Esther - Abbey Foreman, RN - (417) 657-6208
Maplecrest - Amy Schmitz, RN - (417) 657-6308
Boswell - Cheryl Dabney, LPN - (417) 657-6407
Boswell - Melony Murray, RN - (417) 657-6408
LMS - Christine Cromer, RN - (417) 657-6513
LMS - Tracy Millsap, RN - (417) 657-6512
LHS - Erin Bowman, RN - (417) 657-6619
